CONTENT: Yeah I have to talk to a lawyer on that. Sure lets set something up.
Steve, in our Fort Collins office, would probably best to speak with.
Thank you, Randy.  I have heard of your company and will keep you in mind!
Hi randy are you -8 hrs ? I‚Äôm available today when your up give me a call üëç

I have been thinking on this and would say that I am seriously interested. There was a non compete clause for 1 year in the contract I signed like 5 or 7 years ago. I am not sure if they can enforce that or would even know if I did not tell them. Your thoughts on that? I might have to talk to a lawyer. Obviously we would also have to talk on several other topics as well. Maybe call me Monday or I can call you. 614-560-7768.
Hi randy tried to call you earlier if you get chance try and call me back üëç
Thank you for your note.
I can talk now if you like

I actually thought you were contacting me with the invite, but things are a bit weird right now, as I imagine they are for most people. They let Sean go, so I am a little uncertain about the future. It certainly could not hurt to talk.
Thank you for reaching out and I appreciate it!   Thanks,   Candace Mackie
I received your invite to follow the Splashtacular page. How are things going?
Thank you for your message, Randy! Will keep Splashtacular in mind when we work through updates in our city parks.  Best, Kaylyn
Randy,  Sorry for the delay, but thank you on your offer! I will let you know if anything arises.  Thanks, Bianca

Hi Randy.¬† I used to work in the public parks department for the City of Atlanta 20 years ago.¬† I have been in a different field for a while and never was involved with water parks.¬† What you do looks like fun but I don't really have any connections any more that would be valuable to you.
Thanks for reaching out!

Thanks Randy. Short of getting a Mahomes contract, I'm staying put. Strange times we live in now. Few people saw this coming. Not a fan of the mask wearing / social distancing but better safe than sorry I guess.

SUBJECT: Fluent: A Contract Management Solution for your company.
CONTENT:
Dear Randy Flint,


I introduce myself as Shankar Ramchandran. I own a company by the name of Simply Sales.


Global pandemic COVID-19 has caused shockwaves in the global economy. Businesses everywhere are reviewing their commercial contracts, to assess their rights and manage risk.


While it may be easier said than done given everything that is going on right now, this is the time to do some housekeeping on your contracts.


With this message, I would like to take this opportunity to introduce you to Fluent- Our flagship cloud based contract management solution.


Fluent helps you simplify the contract management process, serve the needs of your customers and drive additional value for the company.


Some key benefits that Fluent offers are:


  1. Client & Vendor Side Contract Management in one system.
  2. Contract Clause and Template Libraries: Speed up the creation of contracts with pre-approved language and templates and generate contracts at the click of a button.
  3. Checkpoints and Milestones: Associate relevant checkpoints and milestones with your contracts to ensure that the contract is proceeding as planned.
  4. Cash Flow Projections: Record Cash Flow Projections associated with the contract and ensure timely follow ups.
  5. Collaborative Review: Engage in contextual discussions within a contract. Track changes. See who changed what and when. 
  6. E-Signature of Contracts: E-Sign your contracts with a breeze. 
  7. Blockchain Time Stamping: Establish signers‚Äô accountability publicly with blockchain based time stamping powered by Ethereum.
  8. Reports and Analytics: In-depth Contract analytics to help you make smarter business decisions. Choose from a prebuilt set of reports or create customized reports in a matter of minutes. 

If you would like to know more about Fluent or would like to schedule a free demo to see Fluent in action, please visit our website by clicking the link below:


Fluent Contract Management Solution


Should you have any questions, please feel free to send me e-mail and I shall be more than happy to answer your questions.


Thank you for taking the time to read through this message.


Stay home. Be safe.


Regards,

Shankar Ramchandran

shankar@simplysales.co.in

SUBJECT: Write InMails that your prospects can't ignore
CONTENT:
Hi Randy,


In a world where everyone is competing for the ever-elusive and diminishing mindshare, it's critical to start a successful conversation with prospects as relationships matter more than ever. Sales professionals need to embrace modern selling to stay relevant and a great InMail can be the key.


Luckily for you, LinkedIn Sales Solutions wants to help you create those excellent InMails that prospects simply cannot ignore.


Download our exclusive pocket guide today for access to 5 InMail templates that could hold the secret to your success.


Best regards.


Amanda Bulat

Sales & Marketing Solutions

SUBJECT: Free Resume Evaluation Before Friday
CONTENT: Hi Randy,    We are offering resume evaluations to help seasoned professionals like yourself get more job interviews within the next couple of weeks. As a career coach who has helped over 10,000 job seekers, we will evaluate your skill-set, keywords, and experience and recommend proven strategies to get through employer ATS systems. If you attach your resume or email it to info@thejobhelpers.com before Friday, I will share my feedback with you within 48 hours.   Would you know someone in your network who can benefit from my offer? I am grateful if you could pass my email so they can send me their resume as well.   I hope you have a great day!  Elizabeth Schmitz ‚òÖJob Search Expert‚òÖ

SUBJECT: Consulting opportunity - Randy Flint
CONTENT: Hi Randy,   I hope this finds you well despite these challenging times. I work for a primary research firm called Guidepoint that is based in New York City and sources expert advisors for the management consulting community. Currently, I have a client looking to learn about amusement ride OEM pricing and contracting strategies. I came across your LinkedIn profile and figured, given your background, you‚Äôd be an ideal contact for my client to engage with.  During the paid phone consultation nothing proprietary would be asked. My client is really just looking to get a better understanding of this topic at a very high level and hear your perspective. I think my client could really benefit from your insight so I just wanted to reach out and see if this is something you might be interested in.  If interested, we will set you up with a 45-60 minute phone consultation based on your personal availability. You will be compensated for your time at a prorated hourly consulting rate that you get to set for yourself. You would never be asked to discuss any private or confidential information and the next steps will involve a few screening questions so you can better gauge the topic of conversation.. There is no prep work required for the consultations.  The next step here is to follow the link below to become an advisor in our network. This will allow you to view the topic details provided directly by my client and set your desired hourly consulting rate.  Consultation form: http://gpt.io/qpaK3HXR  I certainly understand it is a chaotic time, but please let me know if of interest and happy to discuss further over a call.  Best Regards and stay safe, Max Florsheim 1-212-842-6620 mflorsheim@guidepoint.com   Max Florsheim Associate, Consulting Team at Guidepoint

SUBJECT: Boost Exhibit & Event Attendance
CONTENT: Randy, the list brokerage experts at AccuList¬Æ will give you access to 1,000s of targeted direct mail and email lists. We have provided quality mailing lists to zoos, aquariums and related venues since 1988, and we know which lists work best to promote attendance at exhibits, gift shop sales and membership growth. AccuList also provides optimized names from modeled cooperative databases. For details on our lists and analytic service, call or text David Kanter at 210-807-9940 or email david@acculist.com.

Hi, Randy  Sending out a quarterly message to let you know what‚Äôs new in my world.  For us I think we helped 30 businesses save millions of dollars last year. The laws change and so do the opportunities. We even negotiate on our client's behalf to get them even better outcomes. Is is all about knowing the law, forming good solid relationships and just helping people.   Here are a number of recommendations from clients via my profile. https://www.linkedin.com/in/kistystephens/  Is this worth a quick call?  Kisty 720-507-4652 Book a call calendly.com/kistystephens

SUBJECT: refreshes visitor experience and increase traffic
CONTENT:
Dear Randy,

You might have heard from us on media such as CNN, FoxSport the Wallstreetjournal. We are an innovative company bringing ice skating fun to venues in +80 countries with our Zero Energy Eco Ice Skating Rinks. We can help you:

Distinguish the experience‚Äì Every advantage counts when attracting new visitors and creating  a reason for a return visit. A Glice Eco-Rink creates a new, exciting and immersive experience that can complement your themes and exhibits by projecting visuals on the skating surfaces. Our rinks are easy to operate, requires no power or water, and cost a fraction of a typical rink.

Additive revenues  ‚Äì A Glice skating rink is a happy and wholesome activity that entire families can enjoy together, but it also creates new opportunities for incremental attendance revenues. Local businesses and retailers often pay sponsorship fees to have their logotypes or messaging appear on the Glice elements that can defray or even cover the cost of a rink.

Connect with community ‚Äì Regional schools and other organizations look for diverse experiences that can be both educational, inspirational and just plain fun. Adding a Glice rink will attract groups looking for a diverse range of activities and programs that will appeal to both kids, teens and adults. A Glice rink adds a new dimension that expands your visitor outreach.

If you want to learn more about how we can help energize your venue, then please connect with us and we will send you our information package.

Kind regards,

Viktor

SUBJECT: RE: Sales Leadership Opportunity:  ID solutions, labels, wristbands, leisure & entertainment
Sales Leadership Opportunity:  ID solutions, labels, wristbands, leisure & entertainment
CONTENT: Hi Randy,   PDC-IDenticard is looking for a Sales Director to lead their Leisure and Entertainment sales team and vertical. This individual will manage, develop and hire (as needed) a national sales team, as well as manage current key accounts and identify new business opportunities. This experienced sales professional will maintain primary customer relationships, and negotiate and close business clients within the leisure, entertainment and attraction industry. The company seeks B2B relationship builders with outstanding presentation and interpersonal skills. The team will sell a mix of custom solutions based on clients' needs, as well as ongoing products - wristbands, labels, employee identification bands/badges and other consumables.  PDC-Identicard is a division of Brady Corporation, an international manufacturer and marketer of complete solutions that identify and protect people, products and places.  Brady's products help customers increase safety, security, productivity and performance and include high-performance labels, signs, safety devices, printing systems and software.  Founded in 1914, the Company has a diverse customer base in electronics, telecommunications, manufacturing, electrical, construction, medical, aerospace and a variety of other industries. Employing 6,300 people worldwide, Brady is headquartered in Milwaukee, WI with sales of approximately $1.11 billion. More information is available online at www.bradycorp.com.  Given your experience, we'd like to speak with you about this opportunity. Please let me know if you'd like to learn more about the role. Thank you,   Chelsea  Chelsea Johnson | Tangent Executive Search chelsea@tangentsearch.com

SUBJECT: Unique opportunity - VP Global Sales and Business Development
CONTENT: Dear Randy,   Boyden has been mandated by Triotech, the world leading developer of next generation, 3D interactive and immersive attractions for segments such as amusement parks, family entertainment centers, shopping malls, science centers and tourist destinations,  is seeking to recruit a Global Vice President Sales and Business Development, who will report directly to the Chief Operating Officer. As the only integrated entity in the industry, Triotech offers seamless integration of hardware, software, and custom content to ensure smooth project delivery, installation, and operation.  The  Global Vice President will be responsible for the direction and management of all sales and business development operations and activities, including lead generation and conversion, inside sales support, and global account leadership.   Your profile and experience seem well aligned with the role. Would you be interested in discussing this opportunity further?  Thank you!   Claudia Pascu, CHRP Senior Associate | Conseillere principale at Boyden

SUBJECT: An Exec. Certificate to Maximize Your Leadership Skills
CONTENT: Hi Randy,We're searching for qualified leaders to apply to our Executive Certificate in Polarities & Paradox. Have you ever grappled with these questions:• Do we do what’s best for the bottom line or what’s best for the environment?• Do I draw a hard line in the sand or worry about being diplomatic?• Do we want managers to spend time focusing on employees or working faster to achieve more output? • Do I support people to motivate them or challenge them to develop?Our cohort-based program teaches you to see paradox and work with polarities as a tool for change on the personal and organizational level. Leaders who can navigate these contradictions outperform those who have not developed this advanced skill.If this is something you might be interested in, visit our website or simply reply to learn more. Best,Lynn ScreenProgram Director, Institute for Transformational Leadership Georgetown UniversitySchool of Continuing Studies

CONTENT: Randy,What do you have planned for Splashtacular this year? No matter what your goals are, access to capital is crucial. Despite recent rain, when I drove around the site a couple weeks ago, the pits were all dry.  We will be moving dirt around to consolidate the holes into the one big lake (and most likely harvesting more clay for other areas of the project, so that our lake has water), so we really have a lot of latitude for the central waterplay area.  The big lake can be shaped and/or positioned as needed.

SUBJECT: Is your health plan helping your business?
CONTENT: Dear Randy,Did you know, 63% of employees say that health care benefits make them feel more loyal to their companies.1   That means choosing a health care plan for your business is about more than just costs. It’s about attracting and retaining top talent by offering quality benefits. In fact, after paid time off, health care benefits are the most important consideration for job seekers.2  Making this challenging decision can be easier with the free Kaiser Permanente Health Care 101 e-book. It details many things you should consider before making decisions about health benefits.   In addition to giving you information on how to compare plans, the e-book provides: • Seven things every small business owner should know about health care • Valuable steps for choosing a health plan provider • Key to understanding the difference between individual coverage and group coverage • Definitions of key health terms  Download the free Health Care 101 e-book today.

If your user group are younger kids, then PolySoft standard troweled system is better as it offers a smoother surfaces, and softer landing. Versatex is non porous broadcast, more tactile.  For a bigger waterpark, Versatex would be good option for general walkways, wave pool entry, lazy river on and off loading zones etc. both system can do design. We also carry an aquatic paint for submerge application, ie walls in wave pool, lazy river, splash pool....a good combination with PolySoft and Versatex.

SUBJECT: Thanks for your interest
CONTENT: Randy,   Thank you for your interest in the Business Development Manager position.   We really appreciate your interest and have reviewed your resume, but unfortunately have decided not to proceed with your candidacy at this time. There has been tremendous interest for this role, so this was not an easy decision.  We do work with lots of exciting companies, so please feel free to take a look at the other jobs we have open here to see if there may be something else that you're interested in. Either way, we will definitely keep you in mind should a role open up that appears to more closely align with your background.  Thanks again for your interest and we wish you luck in your search!
